## Block.getDefaultPropertiesByClass() method

As in getDefaultProperties, but narrow down a given class

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDefaultPropertiesByClass(field: string, clazz?: string): FieldProperties;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | The name of the field to retrieve insert mode properties for. |
|  clazz | string | _(Optional)_ The class to narrow down the search. |

**Returns:**

[FieldProperties](./forms42core.fieldproperties.md)

The properties used in insert mode for the specified class, or `null` if not found.
